item.title: Need Help Change The Price's At Slayer Shop And Eclipse Point Shop
item.dc:creator: @voetbal645 voetbal645
item.description:
@voetbal645 wrote:

shopassistant.java
Search for the item id and u will see something like this.
case ITEMID:
return 30;
the return 30 is for the price
like if u change it to 50 it will cost 50 points

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help Change The Price's At Slayer Shop And Eclipse Point Shop

item.title: Need Help Change The Price's At Slayer Shop And Eclipse Point Shop
item.dc:creator: @Simba96 Simba96
item.description:
@Simba96 wrote:

go to

shopassistant.java
search for the id of your item you wish to change - eg dclaws

search for - case 14484 that is d claws then underneath there will be return ### < is the price

so if you wanted dclaws to be 2000points you would put

case 14484:
return 2000;

let me know if it works

then just put it in the shop you want and it will automatically go to the point system of that shop.

Read full topic
